price: Ina milango saba; na kwa kila mlango iko sehemu walio tengewa.
arabic: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ
footnotes: Wala huo Moto mkali hauna mlango mmoja tu, bali una milango saba kwa ajili ya wingi wanao stahiki kuingia humo. Na kila mlango una kundi lake makhsusi. Na kila kundi una cheo chake maalumu cha kulingana na uovu wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lahā sabʿatu abwābin likulli bābin min'hum juz'on maqsūmun
